description.value:
When you take this feat, you learn to fight in heavier armor than most with your skillset.

  • If you have no armor proficiencies, you gain @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.q10XUuFrVlw8qYj1.JournalEntryPage.BdrD593PiJrHfKFG#light-armor]{light armor} proficiency.

  • If you have only @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.q10XUuFrVlw8qYj1.JournalEntryPage.BdrD593PiJrHfKFG#light-armor]{light}, you gain @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.q10XUuFrVlw8qYj1.JournalEntryPage.BdrD593PiJrHfKFG#medium-armor]{medium armor} proficiency.

  • If you have @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.q10XUuFrVlw8qYj1.JournalEntryPage.BdrD593PiJrHfKFG#medium-armor]{medium armor} proficiency, you gain @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.q10XUuFrVlw8qYj1.JournalEntryPage.BdrD593PiJrHfKFG#heavy-armor]{heavy armor} proficiency.

If you later gain proficiency in the chosen @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.q10XUuFrVlw8qYj1]{armor} type through some other means, you may gain proficiency in the next heaviest armor type (if applicable) or replace this feat with another level 1 feat.
